content:
Sure, here's an updated product description that includes some of these details:

Introducing Restore, the all-natural muscle soothing salve that's like a spa day for your sore muscles. With a refreshing blend of natural ingredients like wintergreen, camphor, peppermint, and ylang ylang, Restore goes on cool and tingly, melting away tension and leaving you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

This convenient roll-on bottle contains Restore blend that has been pre-diluted with fractionated coconut oil, so it’s ready to swipe on at a moment’s notice! And with a blend of helichrysum, blue tansy, blue chamomile, and osmanthus essential oils, Restore is the perfect way to ease your aches and pains and revitalize your body.

Whether you're recovering from a tough workout, dealing with the effects of daily stress, or just need a little self-care, Restore is the perfect way to treat your muscles to the TLC they deserve. Carry it in your purse, backpack, or luggage so it’s always there when you need it.

Restore is made with all-natural, plant-based ingredients that are gentle on your skin and the environment. No harsh chemicals, no synthetic fragrances, just pure, natural goodness. And with a customer base of women over 45, Restore is the perfect way to stay active and healthy, naturally.

Link: [insert link to product page]
